title: Divide By Prime
objective: Ricky is very impressed after learning to check divisibility of any number. Now, he wants to count the number of prime divisors of any number. Can you help him to do it?
task: You are given an integer n, you have to print the number of prime divisors of the integer

title: Swimming Pool
objective: Your friend Alina is an Architect student. She wants to play with you but her mother will not allow her until she completes her homework. Please help her do it.
task: Given a height h and width w, design the outline of the Swimming pool.
output_format: Print the outline of the Swimming Pool

title: Bumble Jumble
objective: You will be given a sentence, make a bumble jumble sentence after doing the given modifications
task: Given a sentence, modify it in the following way: a) Every occurance of a vowel will be replaced by its immediate next character in the English alphabet. b) If any word starts with lowercase, add 'L' to its end.
output_format: Print the string, after performing the given modifications.

title: Into It
objective: Find the smallest substring which contains all the distinct characters.
task: You are given a string, you have to find the smallest substring which contains all the distinct characters of the given string.
